title: [SOLVED] Project Yasuo Border
body: So this is probably quite late, but I feel that I will eventually need to address this so I'll do it here. I owned Project: Yasuo before the event, but never got the border. Who/where do I contact in order to settle this?

replies.body:
I had to do a bit of digging, but you do have the Project Yasuo Border. You need to be using the Project Yasuo skin to get it to show up, as these borders are only designed to work for that specific champ skin. Should look like this!

https://i.gyazo.com/849f37fe9b690fa11ba5e17e8ee27d56.png
Oh wow thank you. I haven't checked it out yet to make sure, but if you say so then I trust you.  Thanks for replying so quickly and sorry I replied so late. I guess I made a mistake.
